belongs_to_collection.name: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants

original_title: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants: Module 2 - Social Confrontation: The Battle of Michigan Ave.
overview: Social Confrontation: The Battle of Michigan Ave. shows the events of Wednesday, August 28 at the 1968 Democratic Convention including National Guardsmen detaining protesters, mass arrests near Grant Park, and Mayor Daley cursing at opponents from the convention floor.
title: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants: Module 2 - Social Confrontation: The Battle of Michigan Ave.
